pizza

Class PizzaComponentResource<T extends PizzaComponent>

  • java.lang.Object
    • pizza.PizzaComponentResource<T>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PizzaCheeseResource, PizzaCrustResource, PizzaSauceResource, PizzaToppingMeatResource, PizzaToppingVegResource

    public abstract class PizzaComponentResource<T extends PizzaComponent>
extends java.lang.Object
    When using for browser, user must login as pizzashop to be authorized. When using for curl, user must provide token associated with its pizzashop to be authorized with path /authorize/{token}. Note PUT method with form should also be implemented.
    Author:
    Geurney

    • Method Detail

      • getPizzaComponent

        public javax.ws.rs.core.Response getPizzaComponent()
        Get Pizza Component in datastore. This operation fails on following conditions:1.the PizzaFactory is not found. 2.Pizza Components are empty in the PizzaFactory 3.This Pizza Component is not found.
        Returns:
        Pizza Component

      • getPizzaComponent

        public javax.ws.rs.core.Response getPizzaComponent(@PathParam(value="token")
                                                   java.lang.String token)
        Find Pizza Component in datastore with token for curl. This operation fails on following conditions:1.the PizzaFactory is not found. 2.Pizza Components are empty in the PizzaFactory 3.This Pizza Component is not found.
        Parameters:
        token - Pizza Factory token
        Returns:
        Pizza Component

      • putPizzaComponent

        @PUT
 @Consumes(value="application/x-www-form-urlencoded")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response putPizzaComponent(@FormParam(value="identifier")
                                                                                                                java.lang.String identifier,
                                                                                                                @FormParam(value="description")
                                                                                                                java.lang.String description,
                                                                                                                @FormParam(value="cost1")
                                                                                                                java.lang.String cost1,
                                                                                                                @FormParam(value="price1")
                                                                                                                java.lang.String price1,
                                                                                                                @FormParam(value="cost2")
                                                                                                                java.lang.String cost2,
                                                                                                                @FormParam(value="price2")
                                                                                                                java.lang.String price2,
                                                                                                                @FormParam(value="cost3")
                                                                                                                java.lang.String cost3,
                                                                                                                @FormParam(value="price3")
                                                                                                                java.lang.String price3)
        Update the Pizza Component in PizzaFactory with form. This operation fails on following conditions: 1.the PizzaFactory is not found. 2.Pizza Components are empty in the PizzaFactory 3.This Pizza Component is not found. 4.New identifier(different from current) already exists. 5. Original costs/prices are not set.
        Parameters:
        identifier - PizzaComponent identifier. Should be unique.
        description - PizzaComponent description
        cost1 - PizzaComponent small size cost. Should not be negative
        price1 - PizzaComponent small size price. Should not be negative
        cost2 - PizzaComponent medium size cost. Should not be negative
        price2 - PizzaComponent medium size price. Should not be negative
        cost3 - PizzaComponent large size cost. Should not be negative
        price3 - PizzaComponent large size price. Should not be negative
        Returns:
        response

      • putPizzaComponentToken

        @Path(value="/authorize/{token}")
 @PUT
 @Consumes(value="application/x-www-form-urlencoded")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response putPizzaComponentToken(@PathParam(value="token")
                                                                                                                                                         java.lang.String token,
                                                                                                                                                         @FormParam(value="identifier")
                                                                                                                                                         java.lang.String identifier,
                                                                                                                                                         @FormParam(value="description")
                                                                                                                                                         java.lang.String description,
                                                                                                                                                         @FormParam(value="cost1")
                                                                                                                                                         java.lang.String cost1,
                                                                                                                                                         @FormParam(value="price1")
                                                                                                                                                         java.lang.String price1,
                                                                                                                                                         @FormParam(value="cost2")
                                                                                                                                                         java.lang.String cost2,
                                                                                                                                                         @FormParam(value="price2")
                                                                                                                                                         java.lang.String price2,
                                                                                                                                                         @FormParam(value="cost3")
                                                                                                                                                         java.lang.String cost3,
                                                                                                                                                         @FormParam(value="price3")
                                                                                                                                                         java.lang.String price3)
        Update the Pizza Component in PizzaFactory with form with token for curl. This operation fails on following conditions: 1.the PizzaFactory is not found. 2.Pizza Components are empty in the PizzaFactory 3.This Pizza Component is not found. 4.New identifier(different from current) already exists. 5. Original costs/prices are not set.
        Parameters:
        token - Pizza Factory token
        identifier - PizzaComponent identifier. Should be unique.
        description - PizzaComponent description
        cost1 - PizzaComponent small size cost. Should not be negative
        price1 - PizzaComponent small size price. Should not be negative
        cost2 - PizzaComponent medium size cost. Should not be negative
        price2 - PizzaComponent medium size price. Should not be negative
        cost3 - PizzaComponent large size cost. Should not be negative
        price3 - PizzaComponent large size price. Should not be negative
        Returns:
        response

      • updatePizzaComponent

        protected javax.ws.rs.core.Response updatePizzaComponent(java.lang.String token,
                                                         java.lang.String newIdentifier,
                                                         java.lang.String description,
                                                         java.lang.String cost1,
                                                         java.lang.String price1,
                                                         java.lang.String cost2,
                                                         java.lang.String price2,
                                                         java.lang.String cost3,
                                                         java.lang.String price3)
        Update the Pizza Component in PizzaFactory. This operation fails on following conditions: 1.the PizzaFactory is not found. 2.Pizza Components are empty in the PizzaFactory 3.This Pizza Component is not found. 4.New identifier(different from current) already exists. 5. Original costs/prices are not set.
        Parameters:
        token - Pizza Factory token
        newIdentifier - PizzaComponent identifier. Should be unique.
        description - PizzaComponent description
        cost1 - PizzaComponent small size cost. Should not be negative
        price1 - PizzaComponent small size price. Should not be negative
        cost2 - PizzaComponent medium size cost. Should not be negative
        price2 - PizzaComponent medium size price. Should not be negative
        cost3 - PizzaComponent large size cost. Should not be negative
        price3 - PizzaComponent large size price. Should not be negative
        Returns:
        Response
